page.title: 07The Village Policeman, Wray
page.content: Our policeman lives in the police house in the village and keeps law and order in the area. His day begins as soon as he is in uniform and signed in to Lancaster Headquarters on his radio. During the day, he walks round the village and calls at people's houses to make sure they are all right. He knows everyone in Wray. Then he drives up on to the fells to call on farmers and make sure no cattle have been stolen. He keeps his eyes open for anything unusual. Later in the afternoon he does some paperwork. After tea, he walks round Mr Holt's farm and Millhouses, then Force, a part of the River Hindburn, to see there are no poachers. Sometimes he gets called out in the night to chase poachers or go to an accident.
